column4: Anyone else want to try and help with Ubuntu 12.04 Video problems, in 3D mode but it won't allow me to set keyboard shortcuts such as alt-tab. It says "New Accelerator...".
Isn't alt-tab already assigned to window switching?
- it is, but the problem is it is disabled because it says I need a New accelerator or something.
or ririshi - any idea how to fix it? I think it has to do with video issues
